alert.note: Alert for Upper Green River Basin Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 01 at 2:09PM MST until December 04 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING THROUGH LATE SUNDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches possible, with the best chance in the Bondurant Valley. West wind could gust 20 to 35 mph. * WHERE...Upper Green River Basin Foothills. * WHEN...From 11 AM Saturday to 5 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...The combination of snow and wind will create hazardous travel. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds will be strongest late Saturday afternoon through Sunday morning, which is also when the highest snow rates are expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches possible around Pinedale.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
